attributes.action: Change the law where the uk government allow free neutering for Xl bully breed
attributes.additional_details: Because of the new regulations set up by the uk government they should give current owners free neutering as they were prepared to pay for the breed to be euthanised
attributes.background: Pay for the neutering of banned breeds

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644181

There is a charitable scheme to support owners with the cost of of neutering XL Bully type dogs. You can find out about this here: https://www.bluecross.org.uk/neutering-your-xl-bully-support
